long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing DeedDiary: Your Daily Dose of Goodness!

Transform your Chrome new tab into a sanctuary of positivity with DeedDiary. This innovative Chrome extension is your personal Deeds Diary, designed to uplift your spirits and keep track of the good deeds that make your heart sing.

With DeedDiary, you can easily log the good deeds you've done each day, whether it's a small act of kindness or a significant contribution to making the world a better place. Simply add your deeds, and let DeedDiary work its magic as a heartwarming reminder. Imagine reliving those moments of joy and kindness, as DeedDiary brings them back to you on the same day next year!

But that's not all – DeedDiary also offers a serene backdrop with a new, calming wallpaper every day, ensuring that your browsing experience is both soothing and uplifting. Plus, stay on track with the time and access Google search right from your new tab.

Start your journey towards a brighter, more compassionate world with DeedDiary – because every good deed deserves to be remembered. Download now and spread the joy!

Developed by Chethiya
